SEARCH
Package entity.enemy

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
entity.enemy.Enemy
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cabbage, Corn, Onion, Tomato
public class Enemy extends Object
This class represents the base class for all the enemies in the game. It contains common elements and functionalities for enemies.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(float x, float y, int id, int enemyType, int waveIndex)
      Initializes the enemy with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      x - The x position in pixels of the enemy.
      y - The y position in pixels of the enemy.
      id - The id of the enemy.
      enemyType - The type of the enemy.
      waveIndex - The index of the wave this enemy belongs to.
